input.sentences: the local fitness centers held a get healthy event at one of our local parks .
the staff was there to show us different exercises and classes that they offered .
i joined in one of the free yoga exhibitions .
my friend and i really had a great time .
it was nice to see all the vendors there encouraging us to be healthier .
output.sentences: A yoga festival was held at a local park.
The staff sat on yoga balls while watching the particlpants and offering their support.
The participants stretched and enjoyed their free lessons.
It was a wonderful way for friends to spend time together.
Everyone, including the vendors, particpants and staff, had a nice day and felt healthier at the end.
